metadata.title: Is USB sample code available at no cost (with no guarantee)?

sections.content:
Question:
Is all USB sample code provided on the Renesas website available at no cost (with no guarantee)?
Are there any restrictions (such as the size of a file that can access the USB drive)?
Answer:
Yes, you can use the sample code free of charge. (Available at no cost, with neither guarantee nor support.)
The following restrictions are placed on USB drive access:
Only USB drives supported by FAT12, FAT16 and FAT32 can be used.
A USB drive having multiple partitions cannot be used.
This driver does not support an MSC device that returns 1 or a larger value to the GetMaxLun command (Mass Storage Class command).
USB drives whose sector size is 512 bytes can be connected.
Restrictions 1, 2, and 4 depend on the file system you use. Also confirm the specifications of the file system.
Suitable Products
RX family
